title: Prime Minister participates at investiture of Congolese President following his re-election
text: In his capacity as representative of President of the Republic Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, Prime Minister Mr Abdelaziz Djerad took part Friday 16 April 2021, accompanied by Minister of Foreign Affairs Mr Sabri Boukadoum, at the swearing-in ceremony of Congolese President Mr Denis Sassou Nguesso, following his re-election.

On this occasion, the Prime minister extended congratulations of President of the Republic to his counterpart Mr Denis Sassou Nguesso and his wishes for success in his new term of office, reaffirming his commitment to strengthening the historical friendship relations between the two countries in order to establish security and stability in the continent.
